name: test_e2e_with_logs[268_PATH_UNI_004]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_UNI_004` |
| **Name** | Unicode null byte injection |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | unicode |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../../../etc/passwd%00.jpg`
